original: Jeansson, Ivan Hugo, skeppsredare, Kalmar, f. 18/10/95 i Kalmar av Hugo J. o. Gustafva Camp. G. 32 m. Ewy Heintze. Barn: CJaes-Magnus f. 33, Lennart 41, Birgitta 44. — Stud:ex. 16, Schartaus hand :inst. fackkurs f. stud. 18. Anst. h. Blom & Co. Norrköp. Rederi A-B 18-19, John Carlbom & Co. Ltd i LIull 19-21, F. G. Reinhold i Danzig 22-23, N. J. Zachariasen i Rouen 23-24, Leffler & Son i Sthlm 24-27, inneh. av Rederi A-B Norrström i Kalmar sed. 27 o. A-B Sandar sed. 47. Led. av styr. f. Rederi A-B Norrström sed. 27 o. A-B Sandar sed. 47.
translated: Jeansson, Ivan Hugo, shipowner, Kalmar, b. 18/10/95 in Kalmar to Hugo J. and Gustafva Camp. Married in 1932 to Ewy Heintze. Children: CJaes-Magnus b. 1933, Lennart 1941, Birgitta 1944. — Graduated from school in 1916, Schartau's Business Institute specialty course for students in 1918. Employed at Blom & Co. in Norrköping 1918-1919, John Carlbom & Co. Ltd in Hull 1919-1921, F. G. Reinhold in Danzig 1922-1923, N. J. Zachariasen in Rouen 1923-1924, Leffler & Son in Stockholm 1924-1927. Owner of Rederi A-B Norrström in Kalmar since 1927 and A-B Sandar since 1947. Member of the board of Rederi A-B Norrström since 1927 and A-B Sandar since 1947.

employmentHistory.roleName: Employed at John Carlbom & Co. Ltd
